resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106689</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106689</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201324</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">DNAi Teacher Guide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">DNAi Lehrer-Anleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide de Professeur de DNAi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia Do Professor De DNAi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida Dell'Insegnante Di DNAi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">DNAi οδηγός δασκάλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía Del Profesor De DNAi</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this guide, the information has been broken down into six sections: DNA Timeline, Code, Manipulation, Genome, Applications, Chronicle. Each section includes teacher pages, alignment with the national science education standards, student worksheets, answer sheets and templates. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Anleitung sind die Informationen unten 
in sechs Kapitel gebrochen worden: DNA Timeline, Code, 
Handhabung, Genom, Anwendungen, Chronik. Jedes Kapitel schließt
Lehrerseiten, Ausrichtung mit den nationalen Wissenschaft Ausbildung 
Standards, Kursteilnehmerbogen, Auswertungsformulare und Schablonen 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De ce guide, l'information a été décomposée en
six sections : Chronologie d'ADN, Code, Manipulation, Génome, 
Applications, Chronique. Chaque section inclut des pages de 
professeur, le cadrage avec les normes nationales d'éducation de la 
science, des tableaux d'étudiant, des formules d'utilisation et des 
descripteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta guia, a informação foi quebrada para baixo
em seis seções: Dna Timeline, Código, Manipulação, Genome, 
Aplicações, Chronicle. Cada seção inclui páginas do 
professor, alinhamento com os padrões nacionais da instrução da 
ciência, folhas do estudante, folhas de resposta e moldes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa guida, le informazioni sono state 
suddivise in sei sezioni: DNA Timeline, Codice, Manipolazione, 
Genome, Applicazioni, Chronicle. Ogni sezione include le pagine 
dell'insegnante, l'allineamento con gli standard nazionali di 
formazione di scienza, i fogli di lavoro dell'allievo, i fogli di 
risposta e le mascherine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτόν τον οδηγό, οι πληροφορίες έχουν χωριστεί σε 
έξι τμήματα: Η υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο DNA, κώδικας, 
χειρισμός, γονιδίωμα, εφαρμογές, εξιστορεί κατά γράμμα. 
Κάθε τμήμα περιλαμβάνει τις σελίδες δασκάλων, ευθυγράμμιση
με τα εθνικά πρότυπα εκπαίδευσης επιστήμης, τα φύλλα εργασίας 
σπουδαστών, τα φύλλα απάντησης και τα πρότυπα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta guía, la información se ha analizado en 
seis secciones: DNA Timeline, Código, Manipulación, 
Genoma, Aplicaciones, Chronicle. Cada sección incluye las 
paginaciones del profesor, la alineación con los estándares 
nacionales de la educación de la ciencia, las hojas de trabajo del 
estudiante, las hojas de respuesta y los modelos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DOLAN DNA LEARNING CENTER, COLD SPRING HARBOR LABORATORY
FN:DOLAN DNA LEARNING CENTER, COLD SPRING HARBOR LABORATORY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201324</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106689</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dnai-teacher-guide</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
